      • commitRun

        public void commitRun​(RunInfo info,
                      short[] glyphs,
                      io.github.humbleui.types.Point[] positions,
                      int[] clusters)
        Description copied from interface: RunHandler

        Called for each run in a line after RunHandler.runOffset(io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper.RunInfo).

        WARN positions are reported from the start of the line, not run, only in Shaper.makeCoreText https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=10898

        Specified by:
        commitRun in interface RunHandler
        positions - put glyphs[i] at positions[i]
        clusters - clusters[i] is an utf-16 offset starting run which produced glyphs[i]
